content: The Summer Solstice has always been celebrated with bonfires and rituals to "tame" or "drive down" dragons. The bonfires and "charms against dragons" (chanted prayers or mock-spells said over a talon, scale, or other "dragon relic") still occur, even among non-clergy, after dusk. Unfortunately, this year, the charms don't appear to be working. Luckily, Binwin Bronzebottom and his team of daring minions are on the job... so they'll probably need your help. This limited time event will run until Monday, June 25th at noon PDT.
title: New Event: Dragondown!

content: Following hot on the heels of the campaign announcement at the Stream of Many Eyes this weekend, we are proud to offer our fans the first opportunity to experience content from Waterdeep: Dragon Heist. Waterdeep: Dragon Heist is our third permanent campaign. The two new adventures in this campaign reveal rumblings of something big going down in Waterdeep. You can also play a challenging variant for each. Blessings for Helm will be unlocked in a future update. Have fun!
title: New Campaign: Waterdeep: Dragon Heist

content:
Hail, champions! This is going to be a very exciting weekend!

Looking for deals on D&D games and DLC? This weekend Steam is running a limited time sale on almost all its D&D related titles! In addition to all that Champions DLC we've seen you eyeing, you can grab dozens of other D&D titles at great discounts!

And while you're playing those new games, tune into Wizards of the Coast's Stream of Many Eyes for an exclusive sneak peak of upcoming D&D content! #SoMEDND
title: Steam D&D Sale & Stream of Many Eyes

content: Several times each century the clockwork plane of Mechanus mobilizes a vast wave of modrons and sends them on a tour of the cosmos. Known as The Great Modron March, this unstoppable tide of lawful constructs journeys across the material plane on the exact same route each time. However, this time something has changed -- the modrons are marching on Waterdeep. This event runs until Monday, June 4th at noon PDT and introduces Evelyn Marthain, the Human Paladin of Lythander! Good luck!
title: New Event: The Great Modron March

content: Part five of the Tomb of Annihilation campaign is now available. The two new adventures take us deep into the jungles of Chult to the Lost City of Omu and the yuan-ti stronghold within. Each adventure comes with one extremely challenging variant. Good luck!
title: New Tomb of Annihilation Adventures!
